title: How To Get Tickets to Coachella 2025
description: Lady Gaga, Post Malone, and Green Day headline the 2025 installment of the Indio, CA festival. Learn how to get tickets and everything else you need to know. How To Get Tickets to Coachella 2025 Scoop Harrison
author: Scoop Harrison
excerpt: Coachella 2025 goes down April 11th-13th and April 18th, 2025. Learn how to get tickets, discounts, and everything else you need to know.
text: Coachella 2025 is set to take place April 11th-13th and April 18th at the Empire Polo Club in Indio, California, featuring a lineup led by headliners Lady Gaga, Green Day, Post Malone, and Travis Scott. Other notables include Charli XCX, Missy Elliott, Megan Thee Stallion, Kraftwerk, The Original Misfits, LISA and JENNIE of BLACKPINK, FKA twigs, Clairo, The Prodigy, Basement Jaxx, and The Marías. Get Coachella 2025 Tickets Here When Do Coachella 2025 Tickets Go On Sale? Tickets to Coachella 2025 will go on sale beginning Friday, November 22nd at 11:00 a.m. PT. Anyone can currently register for a special pre-sale, but those who attended the festival in 2023 and 2024 will receive priority access starting Thursday, November 21 at 11am PT. Organizers recommend purchasing passes for weekend two to have the best chance of securing tickets, as weekend one tends to sell out quickly. GA three-day passes for Coachella weekend one are priced to start at $599 + fees, while weekend two passes go for $549 + free. VIP passes for weekend one start at $1,399 + fees, while weekend two VIP start at $1,199 + fees. Coachella also offers a number of add ons, including shuttle and camping passes. Additionally, Coachella offers payment plans for all festival pass types, starting at $49 per month. Visit the festival website for more information. Are There Any Discounts For Coachella 2025? Fans can save up to 15% off hotel and travel accommodations through Booking.com. Fans can also look for ticket deals on StubHub, where orders are 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. Traditionally, Coachella ticket prices fluctuate closer to the festival. What Is Coachella’s 2025 Lineup? Check out Coachella’s full 2025 lineup via its official poster below, and grab tickets to the festival here.
html:
Coachella 2025 is set to take place April 11th-13th and April 18th at the Empire Polo Club in Indio, California, featuring a lineup led by headliners Lady Gaga, Green Day, Post Malone, and Travis Scott. Other notables include Charli XCX, Missy Elliott, Megan Thee Stallion, Kraftwerk, The Original Misfits, LISA and JENNIE of BLACKPINK, FKA twigs, Clairo, The Prodigy, Basement Jaxx, and The Marías.

Get Coachella 2025 Tickets Here

When Do Coachella 2025 Tickets Go On Sale?

Tickets to Coachella 2025 will go on sale beginning Friday, November 22nd at 11:00 a.m. PT. Anyone can currently register for a special pre-sale, but those who attended the festival in 2023 and 2024 will receive priority access starting Thursday, November 21 at 11am PT. Organizers recommend purchasing passes for weekend two to have the best chance of securing tickets, as weekend one tends to sell out quickly.

GA three-day passes for Coachella weekend one are priced to start at $599 + fees, while weekend two passes go for $549 + free.

VIP passes for weekend one start at $1,399 + fees, while weekend two VIP start at $1,199 + fees.

Coachella also offers a number of add ons, including shuttle and camping passes. Additionally, Coachella offers payment plans for all festival pass types, starting at $49 per month. Visit the festival website for more information.

Are There Any Discounts For Coachella 2025?

Fans can save up to 15% off hotel and travel accommodations through Booking.com.

Fans can also look for ticket deals on StubHub, where orders are 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. Traditionally, Coachella ticket prices fluctuate closer to the festival.

What Is Coachella’s 2025 Lineup?

Check out Coachella’s full 2025 lineup via its official poster below, and grab tickets to the festival here.
